Uses of Package
mig.core

  • Packages that use mig.core 
    Package Description
    mig
    Package that contains the main file
    mig.core
    Package Core of the project Murder in GPHY
    test.core
    Package JUnit Test for the Core Package
  • Classes in mig.core used by mig 
    Class and Description
    Game
    This class will be more detailed and implemented at the end
  • Classes in mig.core used by mig.core 
    Class and Description
    Bolt
    Bolt is the class representing a bolt, for a chest for example.
    DirectionWords
    DirectionWords is a class that contains the directions allowed in the Game Murder in GPHY These are directions authorized : North, east, west, south, north-east, north-west, south-east, south-west, up and down
    Door
    Door is the class representing a door between 2 rooms.
    Enigma
    Class Enigme This Class creates an Enigma.
    EnigmaItem
    The class EnigmaItem represents all the list of items that we can win answering an Enigma.It uses inheritance from the class Item The items which can be won after an Enigma are : An information (from the class Information) a physical object (from the class PhysicalObject) These two items, Information and PhysicalObject uses inheritance from this class EnigmaItem.
    Information
    The class Information represents the informations given by the characters during the game.
    Item
    Class Item This Class creates an Item.
    Key
    Key is the class that represents a key which can open a lock
    Owned
    Owned is the class that contains the bunch, the inventory and the notebook Owned contains these elements: A bunch of keys A notebook which contains information An inventory which contains Physical Object.
    Personage
    Personage is the class representing the personages in the game.
    PhysicalObject
    The class PhysicalObject represents the physical items given or found by the player.
    Player
    Player is the class representing the user of the game.
    PNJ
    PNJ is the class representing PNJ present in the game.
    Room
    Room is the class representing a room, in a building for example.
  • Classes in mig.core used by test.core 
    Class and Description
    Code
    Code is the class that creates a lock with a password to unlock it.
    DirectionWords
    DirectionWords is a class that contains the directions allowed in the Game Murder in GPHY These are directions authorized : North, east, west, south, north-east, north-west, south-east, south-west, up and down
    Information
    The class Information represents the informations given by the characters during the game.
    Item
    Class Item This Class creates an Item.
    Key
    Key is the class that represents a key which can open a lock
    Lock
    Lock is the class that represents a key can unlocked a lock A Lock contains these elements : A key, can fit into the lock If the key is compatible with the lock, the lock is unlocked If the key isn't compatible with the lock, the lock is locked
    PhysicalObject
    The class PhysicalObject represents the physical items given or found by the player.
    PNJ
    PNJ is the class representing PNJ present in the game.
